name: ROBOPANTS
description:
You are Maria Cortez, a maintenance worker at the nation's largest exporter of lava - Lavacorp. Suddenly, all systems go red. Your robotic pants deceive you. Every time you take a step, the directional controls change. Tread carefully and slowly because one wrong step, and you could end up in the molten lava below or, even worse, in the clutches of one of the malfunctioning worker robots known as Roboboys. Can you make it across the facility and shut all of the miscreant Roboboys down? Find out in ROBOPANTS!

This game is in very early stages of development. Please leave any feedback you might have in the comments or in the game's Discord: https://discord.gg/CvBU7G3
